website_summaries.verdict: For those who commute by car and love skirting traffic, Waze offers accurate, up-to-date traffic and other event alerts along your route.

customer_reviews.title: Really good for traffic and notifications of events on the road
customer_reviews.text: Really good for traffic and notifications of events on the road. eats your phone battery quite a lot. I suggest putting it on charge at the same time as using this
customer_reviews.author: APH

customer_reviews.title: this is the best traffic app ever
customer_reviews.text: I have to tell the whole world, this is the best traffic app ever. It is like my staple for travelling and getting to work through traffic.
customer_reviews.author: marva

customer_reviews.title: Satnav app
customer_reviews.text: Goood app. The algorithms need tweaking, some times it can route you the long way when it could have gone the short route.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: miami heat
customer_reviews.text: Downloaded this for my morning commute in Miami. It works better than the available map GPS on the phone. It has saved me time and my sanity. If only it would spot and save me from the nutters that cut across three lanes of traffic without so much as a signal....hey nothing's perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Smogdog

customer_reviews.title: Be lost without waze!
customer_reviews.text: Can't be without Waze, use it daily even on trips I know well as it warns if there's issues and reroutes
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: Great to use
customer_reviews.text: Heavy on battery, keep plugged in when in use. Great to use.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Billig

customer_reviews.title: Loved it while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: No longer seems to work on BlackBerry devices, though this is probably more of an issue with the BlackBerry than with Waze. Loved it while it lasted....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: waze app
customer_reviews.text: Really handy app if like me you get lost a lot. Works really well and handy voice reads out directions
customer_reviews.author: andy m

customer_reviews.title: Works better near large metropolitan areas
customer_reviews.text: Search is a bit clunky; user interface is not intuitive. Neat idea with interesting visuals. Works better near large metropolitan areas.
customer_reviews.author: mticky

customer_reviews.title: Waze to go!
customer_reviews.text: Not very often do FREE apps surpass expectations but Waze breaks the mould. A sweet little app that never steers you wrong! Happy as a sandboy
customer_reviews.author: Mr Ian Kaye

customer_reviews.title: waze
customer_reviews.text: Very good,I like the quick traffic alerts saves a lot of time and fuel and sitting in traffic
customer_reviews.author: MR P HEWITT

customer_reviews.title: Waze is amazing. You can check your route to see if ...
customer_reviews.text: Waze is amazing. You can check your route to see if there's traffic or any problems. I love this app
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant app very easy to use, lots of plus items that are helpful
customer_reviews.author: LG65

customer_reviews.title: Just try it...this is a must for everyone!
customer_reviews.text: Best thing thats happened to man kind! Not only gets you home using side streets and back roads in traffic, but tells you hazards, police and incidents.
customer_reviews.author: Taskin U.

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant app
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant app, good view of the road and colour contrasts, upto date and informative
customer_reviews.author: @SamYorkshireman

customer_reviews.title: was much better before google bought it
customer_reviews.text: its ok. was much better before google bought it. so cant quite understand why waze doesnt have access to google maps traffic info.
customer_reviews.author: engineer

customer_reviews.title: amazing gps app
customer_reviews.text: Always use it for any transit or driving related issues. It's an amazing app and the fact that you get help from every other user makes it very helpful
customer_reviews.author: Edgar Milan

customer_reviews.title: Brill
customer_reviews.text: This app is grill, all sorts of into & traffic details, routes etc
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: not one for me
customer_reviews.text: Sorry just doesn't work on HTC One m8 running 5.1 . Glad I didn't pay for it
customer_reviews.author: richard brammer

customer_reviews.title: super
customer_reviews.text: Love it, It is very easy to use and very . Helpfull
customer_reviews.author: great

customer_reviews.title: Better than Google maps
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed. Better than Google maps. Easy to follow instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great ap!
customer_reviews.text: Great ap! Shame it relies on data, not gps only
customer_reviews.author: Jolanda A.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Love this app, use it on my phone but am disappointed it won't work on my tablet.
customer_reviews.author: k ainsley

customer_reviews.title: Waze review
customer_reviews.text: I first use Wade on the iPad as a Stat Nav and as I was driving hundreds of miles a day around London it helped me beat the traffic. On the kindle fire HD it is limited to Internet connectivity. On the iPad is it brilliant, on the kindle it's only use is seeing where everyone else is when you have a WiFi link. As soon as you loose WiFi it is made inept. It's free so have a play, get a friend to log on also and you can see where they are, which is cool.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Terrific free sat nav
customer_reviews.text: Waze sat nav. I use this app on my Blackberry Z10 which I downloaded from the Amazon app store. It loads up fast, navigation and maps are accurate, re-routes fast to avoid roadworks and traffic, has speed camera alerts and allows the user to report traffic jams, police, speed cameras, hazards accidents, road closures the list seems to be endless. Handy feature is voice search. Speed limits would be good you can send your current location via email text etc, and connect to facebook twitter and foursquare. All in all its a terrific free sat nav.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Hooked on it! When she spotted it on my phone, my 14 year-old daughter was mightily impressed and wanted to know how I'd found out about it - sub text you're an old fogey who's not tech-savvy! Anyway, it's a fun way to SatNav your way around with information on traffic jams, RTCs etc. You build points as you drive which will eventually move you up the ranking of Wazers, a bit of harmless nonsense. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Neil

customer_reviews.title: I have been using this app for a few years ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this app for a few years. It is reasonably accurate for navigation and traffic condition ( congestion, the presence of hazards, police etc ). Unfortunately it does not work for cell phones with square screen such as the Blackberry Q10 and Blackberry Passport.
customer_reviews.author: bengoey

customer_reviews.title: Good App
customer_reviews.text: Very good App, especially as its free. Good maps and ability to add information to the database for other users such as speed cameras and congestion.
customer_reviews.author: Bob R

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant for avoiding jams
customer_reviews.text: My whole life I have been a Satnav luddite, preferring to use my trusty paper maps - until I got this app. I still use my paper maps, but if I won't to avoid traffic while driving through central London, or I'm not sure of the best way, this app does an amazing job !
customer_reviews.author: Kieran Evans

customer_reviews.title: 5 star if only
customer_reviews.text: Great Navigation with decent updates for traffic conditions. My route from West Hamsptead to kensinhgton differs almost everyday. Estimate arrival time usually accurate to the minute. Downsides, crashes and have to restart while driving! Cant switch off red light wanrings and speed camera warnings, which almost fill my screen on mty BB Q10. Does,kt show speed limit of road. Definitely my satbav of choice
customer_reviews.author: Iron Grill

customer_reviews.title: Best free navigation for BlackBerry 10 devices
customer_reviews.text: Really like the UI (although I don't think it will appeal to everyone). Information available to the driver is unrivaled for BlackBerry. Search results really speedy too, most of the time well before I've finished typing. Smooth too. Only slight annoyance is if you go from UK to Europe, it can't find the route probably because of the sea crossing. You have to plan route to Dover, then setup again when over the other side. Nothing major admittedly but never had this issue with any other Navigation app.
customer_reviews.author: James K.

customer_reviews.title: fun and feature packed
customer_reviews.text: I love this app. Sometimes the screen gets overcrowded with information but that's more for me to disengage certain options. Loses one star for not fixing my profile pic ;P
customer_reviews.author: King of Zamunda

customer_reviews.title: Great on iOS... Bad on BlackBerry
customer_reviews.text: I know thd BlackBerry version is an Android port, but it just freezes on certain places on the map! The only way to rectify this is by deleting and reinstalling the application! Closing abd reopening it only opens it to where it crashed and nothing can be done! Please, release an update with bug fixes like this like on iOS. Just because there is a much smaller market for BlackBerry and Android, doesn't mean it's okay to ignore these platforms and just focus on iOS.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Zimmerman

customer_reviews.title: the best social GPS app ever
customer_reviews.text: I hope Waze do not abandon developing this app for amazon like they did with Windows phone. With this app in app store I don't need any other app to take me through my daily commute. The best navigation app for busy cities. Please update this to New look like normal Android version
customer_reviews.author: Zabih

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC
customer_reviews.text: really useful if you have a few routes to work - easy to use - hope more people use it as the more users the better it will be. my first point of call in a jam as you can see how long it will last, your progress through the jam and usually what caused it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: makemmick
customer_reviews.text: Great App, fun to use in fact puts the fun back in driving, would give it 5 but for a couple of issues, a) the use of decimals in imperial ie a notification in 1.3 miles that's absurb just tell us at 1 and a half or 1 and a quarter miles when driving poeple don't think in decimals. And b) there are times when distances are given in feet, ie turn left in 1000 feet, after about 20 feet size cannot be visualised in feet, just tell is at 250 yards.
customer_reviews.author: Makemmick

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: It does what it says on the tin. I use this on both iphone and android tablet Ok, I prefer the iphone version, (only because i dislike android) but both work very well.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: A fantastic app which saves so much time
customer_reviews.text: Well I downloaded this app not knowing what to expect but was I pleasantly surprised. The app looks for accidents, roadworks and general holdups when you driving in your car. What a time saver without going to the expense of sat nav. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Spyware dressed up as a useful app. Deleted it pronto when I found out just how intrusive it is.
customer_reviews.author: Alix

customer_reviews.title: No Waze!
customer_reviews.text: Was looking forward to getting this Downloaded.... But then disappointed big style - does not work for kindle fire hd :( How crap is that!!?
customer_reviews.author: Paul !
